name: Buildbox Document
summary: Learn about .BBDOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only encounter a BBDOC file if you develop a game with Buildbox. The BBDOC is the primary file type associated with the program and is used for saving, closing, and re-opening game build projects.
To create a BBDOC file with Buildbox, select File → New, then click Save or Save As.... To open a BBDOC file with Buildbox, select File → Open....
After you are finished building your game, you can publish it to be played on various platforms, including Windows, Steam, Android, and iOS. To export a BBDOC file, select File → Export.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
